mapper.select: select NAME, AMOUNT from INGREDIENTS where RECIPENUM=#{num}
select STEP, EXPLAIN, FNAME, ONAME from STEPS where RECIPENUM=#{num}
select HASHTAG from HASHTAG where RECIPENUM=#{num}

select COUNT(NUM) from RECIPE
where TITLE like '%'||#{find}||'%'
where WRITER like '%'||#{find}||'%'

select * from (select ROWNUM R, L.* from (select NUM, WRITER, FOODNAME, TITLE, REP_PIC, RATING, ELAPSEDTIME, SCRAP from RECIPE
where TITLE like '%'||#{find}||'%'
where WRITER like '%'||#{find}||'%'
order by
REGDATE
RATING
HIT
desc) L) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
select NUM from RECIPE where FOODNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select RECIPENUM from INGREDIENTS where NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select RECIPENUM from HASHTAG where HASHTAG like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (select ROWNUM R, L.* from (select distinct C.* from RECIPE C, INGREDIENTS I, HASHTAG H
C.NUM=I.RECIPENUM and C.NUM=H.RECIPENUM and C.NUM in
#{num}
order by
C.REGDATE
C.RATING
C.HIT
desc) L) where R between #{listInfo.startRow} and #{listInfo.lastRow}

select COUNT(distinct C.NUM) from RECIPE C, CATEGORY T
C.NUM=T.RECIPENUM and C.NUM in (select RECIPENUM from CATEGORY where C_KIND=#{category.c_kind} and C_SITUATION=#{category.c_situation} and C_PROCEDURE=#{category.c_procedure} and C_INGREDIENT=#{category.c_ingredients})

select * from (select ROWNUM R, L.* from (select distinct C.* from RECIPE C, CATEGORY T where C.NUM=T.RECIPENUM and T.RECIPENUM in (select RECIPENUM from CATEGORY where C_KIND=#{category.c_kind} and C_SITUATION=#{category.c_situation} and C_PROCEDURE=#{category.c_procedure} and C_INGREDIENT=#{category.c_ingredients}) order by
C.REGDATE
C.RATING
desc) L) where R between #{listInfo.startRow} and #{listInfo.lastRow}

select * from (select ROWNUM R, L.* from (select distinct C.* from RECIPE C, INGREDIENTS I where C.NUM=I.RECIPENUM and I.RECIPENUM in (select RECIPENUM from INGREDIENTS where NAME in
#{dto.name} ) order by
C.REGDATE
C.RATING
desc) L) where R between #{listInfo.startRow} and #{listInfo.lastRow}
